alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; O'Brien (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 12 at 7:26PM CST until December 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and east central South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact Tuesday morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle continues this evening. Freezing rain will develop after midnight. As temperatures warm Tuesday morning freezing rain will change to rain.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
